profile.title: Settings
profile.passwordsNotMatching: The passwords you typed don't match
profile.missingCard: Your credit card information is invalid, expired or missing - please update your credit card and save the changes.

trunks.title: Trunks
trunks.helpTwoway: This controls the number of simultaneous calls you can make from the system calling external numbers
trunks.helpInbound: This controls the number of simultaneous calls you can receive to your phone system

balance.title: Per Minute
balance.helpAddCreditOne: By using this, you will add some credits to your current balance, which will allow you to enable features such as e911 or Caller-ID, but also to place per-minute calls.
balance.helpAutoRecharge: By turning on Auto Recharge, you will define a low threshold and how much credits to add when this threshold is reached and you will no longer need to manually add credits.
balance.helpWhenBalanceFalls: Input the amount of credits to reach before auto-recharging your account
balance.helpRecharge: Input how much credits you would like to add once the threshold you defined is reached
balance.payPerMinute: Pay-per-minute allows you to pay only for what you use. Deposit money into your account to get started, then pay-as-you-go for usage.
balance.turnoffRechargeConfirm: By turning off the Auto-recharge, you will have to manually add credits to your balance in order to continue to place per-minute calls and enable features such as e911 or Caller-ID. Do you want to continue?
balance.invalidAmount: There is an error with the amount you typed! Please make sure to type a number using only digits '.' or ','
balance.autoRechargeEnabled: The Automatic Recharge of credits is now enabled!
balance.autoRechargeCancelled: You successfully cancelled the Automatic Recharge of your credits.
balance.creditsAdded: You successfully added {{amount}} to your balance!

servicePlan.empty: Your current service plan is empty!
servicePlan.title: Service Plan

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.noData: There are no transactions between the 2 dates selected !
